description: Retrieves the full details and current state of a specified email archive.

parameters.name: ArchiveId
parameters.description: The identifier of the archive to retrieve.

nested_items.name: ArchiveArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the archive.

nested_items.name: ArchiveId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the archive.

nested_items.name: ArchiveName
nested_items.description: The unique name assigned to the archive.

nested_items.name: ArchiveState
nested_items.description: The current state of the archive:
ACTIVE --- The archive is ready and available for use.
PENDING_DELETION --- The archive has been marked for deletion and will be permanently deleted in 30 days. No further modifications can be made in this state.

nested_items.name: CreatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the archive was created.

nested_items.name: KmsKeyArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the KMS key used to encrypt the archive.

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the archive was modified.

nested_items.name: Retention
nested_items.description: The retention period for emails in this archive.

nested_items.name: RetentionPeriod
nested_items.description: The enum value sets the period for retaining emails in an archive.
